programme.title: NEW KPOP Choice
programme.desc: Refresh your day with the bubbly, feel-good vibes of "Soda Pop." Bursting with sweet melodies, playful beats, and a splash of retro charm, this playlist captures the brighter, cuter side of K-pop. Perfect for dance breaks, sunshine strolls, or just boosting your mood. Let these fizzy tunes pop some joy into your world! programme.title: NEW KPOP Choice
programme.desc: Step into the spotlight with the bold, electrifying energy of "Your Idol." This playlist brings together K-pop’s most powerful performances, confidence-filled tracks, and songs that radiate main character energy. Whether you’re on stage or just vibing in your room, these songs will have you owning every moment. It's a celebration of fierce charisma, unapologetic ambition, and the dream of being the idol. programme.title: NEW KPOP Choice
programme.desc: Explore the vibrant world of K-pop beyond the hits with "Essential K-pop B-Side Tracks".
